import { useState } from 'react' import Head from 'next/head' import Link from 'next/link' import Layout from '../../components/layout' import { getAll } from '../../actions/blog' import {API} from '../../config' import renderHTML from 'react-render-html' import moment from 'moment' const Card = ({ blog }) => { return (

{blog.title}

Posted by {blog.author.name} | Published{" "} {moment(blog.updateAt).fromNow()}

tags,categories

image
{renderHTML(blog.exerpt)} Read more
); }; export default Card;
